entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 17 March 2023
